text: I'm putting together a blog brief for my copywriter for a client.  XX Simple Wedding Cake Ideas That Are [adverb] [verb]. I've been perusing the Google for different ideas on how to present content. Was thinking of including embeds from Pinterest or Instagram as a way to show those ideas. Then have a small description for each. Just trying to find a new way to present the content really. Rather than just the usual photo/description listing, which will be used for a couple of them. Curious if you think this is a good idea? Bad? Doesn't matter?
